nodes.text: 2P-1 was a 2-1B-series medical droid with yellow and white plating. During the First Order's occupation of the planet Batuu in 34 ABY, 2P-1 was kept on display in the Droid Depot, a store located in Black Spire Outpost. The medical droid was displayed in a cage next to the KX-series security droid K-7R1 near the depot's counter. Like all 2-1B surgical droids, 2P-1 was manufactured by Industrial Automaton and stood 1.77 meters tall.
2P-1 appeared as a prop within the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019.
